title: Game Progress Route
content:
aldur's Gate 3 Game Progress Route

Baldur's Gate 3 Act 1 Game Progress Route Quick Navigation

Click to jump to a specific section of the page

Find a way off the Nautiloid Reach the Helm Connect the nerves of the transponder.

When you start the Prologue: Escape the Nautiloid, you'll begin with escaping your pod amidst the commotion. This will also serve as the "Tutorial" portion of the game. As you explore further, you'll see an unstable Nursery in the middle (X:51 Y:-422). Once you get close
